name: LightLine (GalloPintoGames)
description:
You are in a strange planet full of resources but the toxic atmosphere damage your ship when you are outside the light, stay on the light to refill your energy. Find crystals in order to upgrade your ship and be careful because you are NOT alone. 

Use WASD to move / Use mouse to aim / left mouse click to fire 

If you leave the light zones, you will take damage

Stay on the light to regain energy
